com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.analytics.internal.configuration.ConfigurationManager

  • public final class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Functional module that communicates with the UpsightDataStore and is responsible for configuration management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Configuration of the ConfigurationManager.

    • Method Detail

      • onEndpointResponse

        public void onEndpointResponse(EndpointResponse response)
        Method reacts of creation of EndpointResponse.

        If the response type is CONFIGURATION_RESPONSE_SUBTYPE then it is parsed into a collection of UpsightConfiguration and stored in the UpsightDataStore.

        All previous UpsightConfiguration are deleted before storage of the newly arrived collection.

        Parameters:
        response - the EndpointResponse.

      • handle

        public void handle(DispatcherService.DestroyEvent event)

      • launch

        public void launch()
        Starts all internal mechanisms, should be called right after object instantiation

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates ConfigurationManager.
